abstract: Preview of upcoming NFL game between Baltimore Ravens and Pittsburgh Steelers.
lead_paragraph: The Steelers, with quarterback Michael Vick playing for the injured Ben Roethlisberger, will meet the Baltimore Ravens on Thursday night in Pittsburgh.

headline.main: N.F.L. Thursday Matchup: Ravens (0-3) at Steelers (2-1)

snippet: The Steelers, with quarterback Michael Vick playing for the injured Ben Roethlisberger, will meet the Baltimore Ravens on Thursday night in Pittsburgh.
